InstalledItem.Name: YellowJacket GT-210 Gatling
InstalledItem.Description:
Manufacturer: Gallenson Tactical Systems
Item Type: Ballistic Gatling
Size: 1

While the GT-210 YellowJacket may be small, it packs a mighty sting. This high-speed ballistic weapon is perfect for targeting smaller, more mobile targets and its DTX-8 ammo supply system almost completely eliminates weapon jams due to bad rounds.

InstalledItem.Name: YellowJacket GT-210 Gatling
InstalledItem.Description:
Manufacturer: Gallenson Tactical Systems
Item Type: Ballistic Gatling
Size: 1

While the GT-210 YellowJacket may be small, it packs a mighty sting. This high-speed ballistic weapon is perfect for targeting smaller, more mobile targets and its DTX-8 ammo supply system almost completely eliminates weapon jams due to bad rounds.

InstalledItem.Name: Revenant Gatling
InstalledItem.Description:
Manufacturer: Apocalypse Arms
Item Type: Ballistic Gatling
Size: 4

If it ain’t broke, don’t fix it. And if you want it broke, aim a Revenant at it. Solidly built on a foundation of centuries-old tech, Apocalypse Arms puts an innovative spin on battle-tested designs to create a rugged ballistic Gatling that can steadily hurtle death across the void. Though it’s slow to spin up and cool down, the Revenant’s dependability makes it a favorite for those expecting to find trouble.

InstalledItem.Name: CF-337 Panther Repeater
InstalledItem.Description:
Manufacturer: Klaus & Werner
Item Type: Laser Repeater
Size: 3

The CF-337 Panther is the size three model in Klaus & Werner's laser repeater line. The Panther is a true fire-and-forget weapon with a respectable power consumption-to-damage ratio. Pilots who outfit their ships with Panthers rarely regret the decision.

InstalledItem.Name: CF-337 Panther Repeater
InstalledItem.Description:
Manufacturer: Klaus & Werner
Item Type: Laser Repeater
Size: 3

The CF-337 Panther is the size three model in Klaus & Werner's laser repeater line. The Panther is a true fire-and-forget weapon with a respectable power consumption-to-damage ratio. Pilots who outfit their ships with Panthers rarely regret the decision.

InstalledItem.Name: MSD-322 Missile Rack
InstalledItem.Description:
Item Type: Missile Rack
Manufacturer: Behring
Size: 3
Missiles: 2xS2

Behring’s MSD-322 "Marsden" is a complete ordnance storage and deployment system that can be mounted on any compatible size 3 hardpoint for the reliable and effective launch of two S2 missiles.

InstalledItem.Name: Ignite II Missile
InstalledItem.Description:
Manufacturer: Firestorm Kinetics
Tracking Signal: Infrared
Size: 2

The Ignite is Firestorm's premier brand of heat-seeking strike missile that is the definition of Fire and Forget. Simply let it fly and enjoy the show.

InstalledItem.Name: Tempest II Missile
InstalledItem.Description:
Manufacturer: Firestorm Kinetics
Tracking Signal: Cross Section
Size: 2

The Tempest was designed with nothing but annihilation in mind. Utilizing FireStorm Kinetics' targeting technology, this proximity missile locks onto a target's cross section to draw conflicts to a swift conclusion.

InstalledItem.Name: WEB
InstalledItem.Description:
Item Type: Shield Generator
Manufacturer: Seal Corporation
Size: 1
Grade: C
Class: Civilian

Tried, tested, and refined for centuries, the WEB shield generator balances sleek design with stellar performance to keep your ship safe under a wide variety of circumstances.

InstalledItem.Name: JS-300
InstalledItem.Description:
Item Type: Power Plant
Manufacturer: Amon & Reese Co.
Size: 1
Grade: A 
Class: Military

This high-end, military-grade component from A&R delivers excellent performance and solid durability at the expense of slightly increased emission levels. However with the JS-300 pedigree, it’s easy to see why this small power plant has many fans in the military.

InstalledItem.Name: Polar
InstalledItem.Description:
Item Type: Cooler
Manufacturer: Aegis Dynamics 
Size: 1
Grade: B
Class: Military

Built to the high demands of daily military service, Aegis’ Polar cooler features a reinforced frame for increased durability. You can rest assured that when you drop into the fires of combat, the Polar will keep your ship cool.

InstalledItem.Description:

Manufacturer: ArcCorp 
Size: 1
Grade: C
Class: Civilian

The Rush is a popular commercial quantum drive that lives up to its name.

InstalledItem.Name: Ecouter
InstalledItem.Description:
Item Type: Radar
Manufacturer: GNP
Size: 1
Grade: C
Class: Military

Space is vast and unknowable, that’s why discerning pilots rely on the Ecouter small radar from GNP to keep them in the know about what’s around them.
